content: I’ve not really done a lot of setup — I know that there are extensions, etc. JSX works out-of-the-box and “create-react-app” provides good linting. The main thing I’ve done is to create a .vscode/settings.json file in my project in order to define a “files.exclude” entry to omit some of my project folders (such as “node_modules”) from find-in-files search results.
